hooks.command: BACK_FILES=$(git status --porcelain | grep -E '^[AM?][M?] back/.*\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$' | cut -c4- | sed 's|^back/||'); EXISTING_FILES=""; for file in $BACK_FILES; do if [ -f "back/$file" ]; then EXISTING_FILES="$EXISTING_FILES $file"; fi; done; if [ -n "$EXISTING_FILES" ]; then cd back && yarn lint-fix-files $EXISTING_FILES; fi

BACK_TS_FILES=$(git status --porcelain | grep -E '^[AM?][M?] back/.*\.(ts|tsx)$' | cut -c4- | sed 's|^back/||'); EXISTING_TS_FILES=""; for file in $BACK_TS_FILES; do if [ -f "back/$file" ]; then EXISTING_TS_FILES="$EXISTING_TS_FILES $file"; fi; done; if [ -n "$EXISTING_TS_FILES" ]; then cd back && yarn typecheck $EXISTING_TS_FILES; fi
